original_title: サッカー部の女子マネージャーは毎日、顧問教師の性処理をさせられています。 堀北わん
overview: Half a year ago, Natsukawa, a female manager, joined our soccer club. Polite and serious, she was liked by everyone... I was also fond of her despite my age. Of course, I thought it was impossible, but more than anything, I didn't like the guy I hated... Never forgive! If that man has sex with me, I'll have sex first... (laughs).
title: The Female Manager Of The Soccer Team Is Taking Care Of The Advisor Teacher’s Sexual Needs, Every Day. Wan Horikita
